pages.text: $(item)Fancy Spiralled Tubers$() is a Vegetable Food item cooked in the $(pot)Crock Pot$() by combining a $(item)Potato/Baked Potato$(), $(item)Stick/Bamboo$() and two fillers. Fillers cannot be $(thing)Meats$(), only one filler can be $(thing)Monster$() Food, only one filler can be $(thing)Inedible$(). It takes 15 seconds to cook.
